de.hsos.ecs.richwps.wpsmonitor.control.event

Class MonitorEventHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsos.ecs.richwps.wpsmonitor.control.event.MonitorEventHandler

  • public class MonitorEventHandler
extends Object
    EventHandler system for monitor events, like shutdown.
    Author:
    Florian Vogelpohl

        public void registerEvent(String eventName)
        Registers an eventname; does nothing if the eventname already exists.
        Parameters:
        eventName - Event Name which should be registred

        Fires an event.
        Parameters:
        event - MonitorEvent-instance

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(String eventName,
                    MonitorEventListener eventToRegister)
                      throws EventNotFound
        Registers a listener for a specific event.
        Parameters:
        eventName - name of the event which the listener should listen
        eventToRegister - EventListener instance
        Throws:
        EventNotFound - If the event is not found

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(String eventName,
                  MonitorEventListener listenerToRemove)
                    throws EventNotFound
        Removes a given listener from the eventname.
        Parameters:
        eventName - name of the event
        listenerToRemove - Eventlistener object which should be removed
        Throws:
        EventNotFound - If the event is not found

      • merge

        public void merge(MonitorEventHandler toMerge)
        Merges the given EventHandler-instance with this EventHandler instance.
        Parameters:
        toMerge - EventHandler instance.
